results.title: Anna (Vietnamese Version)
results.brief_description: Anna is the story of a young mother and her mentally handicapped son, Tom. The film traces the path followed by Anna in overcoming her distrust of professional health workers and outsiders. We follow Anna as she searches with increasing confidence for the extra help that she is told is available to herself and young son Tom.
results.description: Anna is the story of a young mother and her mentally handicapped son, Tom. results.title: Animated
results.brief_description: An off-the-wall, engagingly funny, slightly serious and brilliantly assembled collection of the maddest moments of Australia’s unsung film art. A film which rolls 75 years of history into 80 rip roaring minutes of fun and hi-jinx.

results.title: Animals of the Indian jungle
results.creator_credit: F Von Keller, Milan Herzog and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
results.brief_description: Explores the dense tropical rain forest of eastern India, showing close up views of representative animals in their native environment - the crocodile, tiger, python, cobra, mongoose, monkey and elephant. Describes and illustrates the pattern of survival in the jungle, pointing out the ways of the hunters and the defences of the hunted. Photography by Jack Cardiff. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
